pr_title: Refactor getter and setter methods for resource classes

replies.bodyText: Fixed according to track 1 style. Though it's strange they put getTags/withTags together.

replies.bodyText: any context on why track1 is getTags(), but not tags? If no specific reason, this is good time for us to fix it for aligment.
